name.en: Special Topics-Analysis and Application of Meteorology Radar data
name.ch: 專題討論-雷達氣象應用

goal.en: The hazard weather events cause great damage to the society all over the world. Most of these events are related to mesoscale meteorology. Different from synoptic- and micro- scale meteorology, the mesoscale weather systems are complex and changeful. The spatiotemporal scan can vary from few kilometers to few thousand kilometers and few minutes to days. With the advanced of the observing technology and numerical model simulation, the understanding of mesoscale weather system has been greatly improved. The main goal of this course is to introduce various mesoscale weather systems including the formation, structure, physical, dynamical and maintaining mechanisms.
goal.ch: 此專題主要目的為讓大學部學生認識劇烈天氣觀測與數值模擬，並透過基本實作將理論與實際結合，以瞭解當代中尺度觀測與數值預報之進展。了解雲物理與動力過程，對流系統維持機制等。以專題報告的型式，透過觀測資料分析與數值模擬實驗比對驗證，幫助學生了解實際中尺度天氣個案。此課程內容包含基本文獻導讀，及分組報告建立對中尺度天氣系統的了解。實作部分將介紹相關程式與繪圖，包含雙偏極化雷達資料處理及ＷＲＦ數值模式實驗，建立基本資料處理能力。修課同學將依研究課題，進行雷達觀測，資料同化，數值模擬分組。並需在學期結束前選擇一研究課題，並提交專題研究報告成果。

content.en:
Introduction of radar, mesoscale meteorology and numerical simulation (two weeks)
Paper review of mesoscale analysis using observation data (one week)
Paper review of mesoscale simulation and data assimilation (one week)
Introduction of data processing program and practice: dual-polarimetric radar (two weeks)
Introduction of data processing program and practice: mesoscale simulation (two weeks)
Research project planning (1~1.5 month)
Final report
content.ch:
雷達及中尺度同化、模擬簡介(兩星期)
中尺度觀測分析文獻回顧 (一星期)
中尺度模擬、同化分析文獻回顧 (一星期)
資料處理程式介紹與練習：雙偏極化雷達資料處理與分析(兩星期)
資料處理程式介紹與練習：中尺度模式資料處理與分析(兩星期)
專題構想準備(一星期)
分組研究及準備報告(一～一個半個月)
成果報告(一星期)
